Client GUI modules documentation¶

add_contact.py¶

A module describes a menu for adding a user to the contact list.

class client.gui.add_contact.AddContact(transport, database)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

Dialog for adding a user to the contact list. It offers the user a list of possible contacts and adds the selected one to the contacts.

get_possible_contacts()¶

The method of filling out the list of possible contacts. Creates a list of all registered users except those already added to contacts and himself.

update_possible_contacts()¶

Method for updating the list of possible contacts. Requests a list of known users from the server and updates the contents of the window.

delete_contact.py¶

A module describes a menu for removing a user from the contact list.

class client.gui.delete_contact.DeleteContact(database)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

Dialog to delete a contact. Displays the current contact list, has no handlers for actions.

main_window.py¶

The module describes the main window of clients.

class client.gui.main_window.ClientMainWindow(client_name, database, transport, keys)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QMainWindow

Class - the main window of the user. It contains all the basic logic of the client module.

add_contact(item)¶

The method of adding a contact to the server and client database. After updating the database, the contents of the window are also updated.

Parameters

item (str) – username.

add_contact_action(item)¶

Method gets username from drop_menu.

Parameters

item (obj) – class object.

add_contact_window()¶

Method creating a window - dialog for adding a contact

client_list_update()¶

The method updates the contact list.

connection_loss()¶

The slot handler is a loss of connection to the server. Gives a warning window and terminates the application.

delete_contact(item)¶

Method removing contact from server and client database. After updating the database, the contents of the window are also updated. :param obj item: class object.

history_list_update()¶

The method fills the message history.

make_connection(transport)¶

Connection Creation Method.

Parameters

transport (obj) – socket object.

new_message(message)¶

The slot handler of incoming messages, decrypts incoming messages and stores them in the message history. Asks the user if a message was received not from the current interlocutor. If necessary, change the interlocutor.

Parameters

message (dict) – message dict.

remove_contact_window()¶

Method creating a window for deleting a contact.

select_active_user()¶

Method handles double-click on contact.

send_message()¶

The method encrypts and sends messages to the user.

set_active_user()¶

The method of activating chat with the interlocutor.

set_disabled_input()¶

Deactivate the input field.

signal_205()¶

Message slot 205 - a request by the server to update directories of available users and contacts. It may turn out that the current person is deleted, you need to check this and close the chat with a warning. Otherwise, just update the contact list without giving a warning to the user.

main_window_gui.py¶

The module describes the GUI of the main window of clients.

class client.gui.main_window_gui.Gui_MainClientWindow¶

Bases: object

The class describes the GUI of the main window of clients.

retranslateUi(MainClientWindow)¶

The method assigns Russian-language names to interface elements.

setupUi(MainClientWindow)¶

The method creates interface elements of the main window.

start_menu.py¶

The module describes a menu for entering a username at program startup.

class client.gui.start_menu.AuthMenu¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QDialog

The class describes the start menu for entering a username.

check_not_empty()¶

Button handler login_button. If the field is not empty, then change the ok_pressed flag to True and close the window.

Messenger
